column1: and  unambiguous  statement  either  in  'P13  or  in  'P14'  that the  land  in
question  will  be  given  on  a long term  lease  to the  Petitioner. The  latest
letter issued  by  the 2nd  Respondent  marked  'P22' confirms this position.
In  these  circumstances,  this  Court  is  of  the  view  that  'P13  and

column2: cannot give  rise to a legitimate expectation in the mind of the Petitioner

column1: that  the  State  was  agreeable  or was  contemplating  to  give  him  a  long
term lease of the said  land.
